content.question: Which of the following parts of the United States Constitution is incorporated to the states based on the ruling in McDonald v. Chicago (2010) ?

choices.label: “Congress shall make no law respecting an establishment of religion.”
“The right of the people to be secure in their persons, houses, papers, and effects, against unreasonable searches and seizures, shall not be violated.”
“No person shall . . . be compelled in any criminal case to be a witness against himself.”
“[T]he right of the people to keep and bear Arms, shall not be infringed.”

content.answer: “[T]he right of the people to keep and bear Arms, shall not be infringed.”
